link.title: Flint City School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Flint City School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Flint, MI.

h1.a: Flint Community Schools Expect More. Achieve More.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1850px; height: 650px;

div.div: We are committed to keeping you informed of all important updates within the district. For that reason, we wanted to make you aware of personnel changes taking place within our schools. To ensure continuity of educational programming, the following district leaders will take on new roles beginning Monday, April 15, 2019.

First Student Flint wants to put YOU behind the driver's seat! Take advantage of our on the spot interviews and the opportunity to talk to our knowledgeable staff about joining our team!! Please contact (810) 760-1317.

img.alt: MORE for your child at Flint Community Schools Thumbnail Image

h1.a: MORE for your child at Flint Community Schools

div.div: Exciting choices for your child at Flint Community Schools

article.div: Basic Structure for online physical education workouts. Each person will perform the workout for their age group for the days associated with each workout. If you would like to attempt some other age group workouts you are welcome to do so.

span.h2: FLINT, Michigan—She can still hear the shuffling of her students from right outside of the door as students fill the hallway before and after classes. And although principal is her title, Kelly Fields is so much more than that to her students and the community of Flint.

address.span: Flint Community Schools Expect More. Achieve More.
